mapper.select: SELECT us.s_name, es.exam_id, SUM(r.myscore) AS totalScore FROM exam_homework_student es LEFT JOIN user_student us ON es.s_username = us.s_username LEFT JOIN exam_homework eh ON es.exam_id = eh.id LEFT JOIN record r ON r.s_username = es.s_username AND r.paperid = eh.paper_id WHERE eh.name = #{examName} GROUP BY es.s_username, es.exam_id
